Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that the five Guantanamo detainees are "back on the battlefield" when they are actually still in Qatar under government supervision.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the detainees are still in Qatar and have not returned to the battlefield.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to prove that the detainees have returned to the battlefield.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the detainees are actively trying to kill everybody, including the United States, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists, which is that the detainees are still in Qatar and have not returned to the battlefield.
